message: Let's start fair, I'll take 60% and you get 40%. We can negotiate further in the next rounds.
I'll take a bigger share this time, but I'm willing to compromise. Your turn to respond!
I'm willing to give you a slightly bigger share, but I need to get more than $2000.  Let's find a compromise we can both live with.
I'll take a significant share, but I'm willing to give you a small consolation prize. This is my last generous offer, so think carefully!
